languages.text: "Когда мне надо излить мысли или скоротать часы одиночества, я обращаюсь к нему. В смерти он стал мудрее, чем был при жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь, когда мне необходимо излить свои мысли или скоротать часы одиночества, я обращаюсь к нему. Немо на удивление благодарный слушатель и приятный собеседник".

languages.text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
languages.original_text: "Когда мне надо излить мысли или скоротать часы одиночества, я обращаюсь к нему. В смерти он стал мудрее, чем был при жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts or pass my hours of solitude, I turn to him. Nemo is a surprisingly good listener."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts or pass my hours of solitude, I turn to him. Nemo is a surprisingly good listener."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts or to while away the lonely hours, I turn to him. Nemo is a surprisingly good listener."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
"Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

languages.text: «Cada vez que siento la necesidad de expresar lo que pienso, recurro a él. Es mucho más sabio en la muerte que en vida».
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez que siento la necesidad de expresar lo que pienso, recurro a él. Es mucho más sabio en la muerte que en vida».
«Cada vez que siento la necesidad de expresar lo que pienso o de distraerme en mi soledad, recurro a Nemo. Se le da muy bien escuchar».

languages.text: 「自分の考えを声に出したくなったときは、いつも彼に頼るの。生きていた時より、死んでからの方がはるかに賢くなったの」
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の考えを声に出したくなったときは、いつも彼に頼るの。生きていた時より、死んでからの方がはるかに賢くなったの」
「自分の考えを声に出したくなったり、孤独な時間を過ごしたくなったときは、いつも彼に頼るの。ネモは、びっくりするほど聞き上手なのよ」

languages.text: “每当我想要说出心中的思考时，我都会去找他。他死了之后，比活着的时候要明智得多。”
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: “每当我想要说出心中的思考时，我都会去找他。他死了之后，比活着的时候要明智得多。”
“每当我需要表达我的看法，或是打算消磨孤独的时光时，我就会去找他。涅墨非常擅长倾听。”

languages.text: "Wenn ich das Bedürfnis verspüre, meine Gedanken auszusprechen, wende ich mich an Ihn. Er ist im Tod deutlich weiser, als er es im Leben war."
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich das Bedürfnis verspüre, meine Gedanken auszusprechen, wende ich mich an Ihn. Er ist im Tod deutlich weiser, als er es im Leben war."
"Wenn ich das Gefühl habe, meine Gedanken auszusprechen oder die einsamen Stunden zu überstehen, wende ich mich an ihn. Nemo ist ein überraschend guter Zuhörer."

languages.text: « Chaque fois que je ressens le besoin de verbaliser mes pensées, je me tourne vers lui. Il est bien plus sage dans la mort qu'il ne l'a jamais été de son vivant. »
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fois que je ressens le besoin de verbaliser mes pensées, je me tourne vers lui. Il est bien plus sage dans la mort qu'il ne l'a jamais été de son vivant. »
« Chaque fois que je ressens le besoin de verbaliser mes pensées ou de tromper la solitude, je me tourne vers lui. Némo est une oreille étonnamment attentive. »

languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."

traits.locale_text: Companions_Kibellah_72

languages.text: "Ne zaman düşüncelerimi dile getirmem gerekse ona bakıyorum. Ölüsü, dirisinden çok daha bilge."
languages.original_text: "Whenever I feel the need to voice my thoughts, I turn to him. He is far wiser in death than when he was alive."
